reuters.title: WAXMAN INDUSTRIES <WAXM> TO SELL CONVERTIBLES
reuters.body: Waxman Industries Inc said it filed with the Securities and Exchange Commission a registration statement covering a 25 mln dlr issue of convertible subordinated debentures due 2007. Proceeds will be used to repay short-term indebtedness and for general corporate purposes, which may include acquisitions, Waxman said. The company named Drexel Burnham Lambert Inc as sole underwriter of the offering. Reuter 
